rule.conditionDesc: ( sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 3 OR sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 4)
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="number">3</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Apply To">sharedflag</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="number">4</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Share Record to Incident Area (when ( sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 3 OR sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 4))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var tablename = \"imArea\";\u000avar area_name = record.area_name;\u000avar category = record.category;\u000avar subcategory = record.subcategory;\u000avar active = record.active;\u000avar sharedflag = record.sharedflag;\u000avar company = record.company;\u000avar description = record.description;\u000a\u000alib.HelpDeskCategoryUtil.addAreaRecord(tablename, area_name, subcategory, category, active, sharedflag, company, description);"}

rule.fullDesc: Share Record to Problem Area (when ( sharedflag in CurrentRecord = 4))
rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"var tablename = \"pbmArea\";\u000avar area_name = record.area_name;\u000avar category = record.category;\u000avar subcategory = record.subcategory;\u000avar active = record.active;\u000avar sharedflag = record.sharedflag;\u000avar company = record.company;\u000avar description = record.description;\u000a\u000alib.HelpDeskCategoryUtil.addAreaRecord(tablename, area_name, subcategory, category, active, sharedflag, company, description);"}
